title: Peppa Pig
description: Peppa Pig and her family go on fun adventures while learning about friendship and everyday life.

title: Dora the Explorer
description: A young girl named Dora goes on quests with her monkey Boots, solving puzzles along the way.

title: Motu Patlu
description: Comedy adventures of Motlu and Patlu in the town of Furfuri Nagar.

title: Doraemon
description: Doraemon is a fictional character and the title character of the manga and anime eponymous series of the same name created by Fujiko Fujio. Doraemon is a male robotic cat that travels back in time from the 22nd century to aid a preteen boy named Nobita Nobi.

title: Tom and Jerry
description: Classic cat and mouse chases between Tom the cat and Jerry the clever mouse.

title: Shin Chan
description: The mischievous 5-year-old Shin Chan creates chaos with his hilarious antics.

title: Paw Patrol
description: A team of rescue dogs led by a boy named Ryder tackle high-stakes missions.
